ThingDef.label: Beretta 93R
ThingDef.description: A micro-submachine gun. It is short-ranged, but very light in the hands. Its rate of fire tends to make up for its weakness.

ThingDef.label: Škorpion vz. 61
ThingDef.description: A micro-submachine gun. It is short-ranged, but very light in the hands. Its rate of fire tends to make up for its weakness.

ThingDef.label: Thunderbird
ThingDef.description: A fully-automatic modified Desert Eagle, fitted with a stock, a 14 round magazine, and a reflex sight. Very unwieldy in the wrong hands.

ThingDef.label: IMI Uzi
ThingDef.description: A relatively compact submachine gun with a foldable stock.

ThingDef.label: IMI Micro Uzi
ThingDef.description: An infamous machine pistol design, very hard to control in automatic fire.

ThingDef.label: MP5A2
ThingDef.description: A full-sized submachine gun with a relatively light weight.

ThingDef.label: MP5K
ThingDef.description: A stockless variant of the classic MP5. Very unwieldy but can be used one-handed.

ThingDef.label: MP5K-PDW
ThingDef.description: A compact submachine gun with a folding stock.

ThingDef.label: MP5SD6
ThingDef.description: A full-sized submachine gun with an integrated suppressor.

ThingDef.label: MP5/10
ThingDef.description: A full-sized submachine gun with a relatively light weight. Chambered for the much more lethal 10mm cartridges and fitted with a reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: UMP40
ThingDef.description: Lightweight submachine gun firing heavy .40 caliber rounds.

ThingDef.label: UMP40 Custom
ThingDef.description: Customized law enforcement submachine gun firing heavy .40 caliber rounds. Fitted with a holographic sight and a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: Thompson submachine gun
ThingDef.description: A full-sized submachine gun with a high capacity drum magazine.

ThingDef.label: M3 "Grease Gun"
ThingDef.description: A simple mass-produced submachine gun. Cheaper than other guns, expect some regressions.

ThingDef.label: M3 SpecOps Generation 2
ThingDef.description: Modernized ancient submachine gun, fitted with a red dot sight and a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: Luty submachine gun
ThingDef.description: A very simple improvised firearm, able to be made out of anything laying around. It has an unrifled barrel, no semi-automatic fire, no stock, and no sights, making this gun unfathomably inaccurate.

ThingDef.label: AR-57
ThingDef.description: A relatively compact submachine gun using a specialized cartridge designed to penetrate armor.

ThingDef.label: AR-57 (semi)
ThingDef.description: A blowback-operated semi-automatic rifle using an underpowered cartridge designed to penetrate armor.

ThingDef.label: RD-9 Tactical
ThingDef.description: An integrally supressed PDW based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 9mm. Fitted with a reflex-sight.

ThingDef.label: RD-45 Tactical
ThingDef.description: An integrally supressed PDW based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .45 ACP. Fitted with a reflex-sight.

ThingDef.label: RD-300 Tactical
ThingDef.description: An integrally supressed PDW based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .300 Blackout. Fitted with a reflex-sight.

ThingDef.label: CMMG Banshee Mk9 Auto
ThingDef.description: A submachine gun based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 9mm. Normally made only semi-automatic due to civilian restrictions, this one however is capable of select-fire.

ThingDef.label: CMMG Banshee Mk9
ThingDef.description: A pistol-caliber carbine based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 9mm.

ThingDef.label: CMMG Banshee Mk10 Auto
ThingDef.description: A submachine gun based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 10mm. Fitted with a suppressor and a reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: B&T APC9K Pro
ThingDef.description: A compact submachine gun favored by security and law enforcement. Small enough to be used one-handed.

ThingDef.label: FN P90
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, highly maneuverable submachine gun with a 50-round magazine positioned on top of the weapon. Comes with an integrated reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: FN PS90
ThingDef.description: A blowback-operated semi-automatic rifle using an underpowered cartridge designed to penetrate armor.

ThingDef.label: PP-19 Bizon-2
ThingDef.description: Lightweight high-capacity submachine gun.

ThingDef.label: Type 79 Tactical
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, gas-operated submachine gun, modernized with an extended 30-round magazine and a reflex-sight. Has a higher effective range compared to most SMG type weapons.
